blogPost.title: What are the benefits of prioritizing customer experience when designing a product? Answer by Poulomi Damany, General Manager of Assets at Credit Karma. https://t.co/d5p299BxU5 https://t.co/b7uVMnYx5M
blogPost.author: Quora

localize.full_text: 製品設計時にカスタマー・エクスペリエンスを優先することのメリットは何ですか？回答者：Poulomi Damany（Credit Karma社アセット部門ジェネラルマネージャー） https://t.co/d5p299BxU5 https://t.co/b7uVMnYx5M
在设计产品时，优先考虑客户体验的好处是什么？回答者：Poulomi Damany，Credit Karma的资产部总经理。https://t.co/d5p299BxU5 https://t.co/b7uVMnYx5M
在設計產品時，優先考慮客戶體驗的好處是什麼？回答者：Poulomi Damany，Credit Karma的資產部總經理。https://t.co/d5p299BxU5 https://t.co/b7uVMnYx5M

previous.title: How did the ACLU extend the Bill of Rights to the states? Answer by @EllisCose, Author of Democracy, If We Can Keep It. https://t.co/KM3IET0BZE https://t.co/IF3KQUgtdx

localize.full_text: ACLUはどのようにして権利章典を各州に拡大したのか？Answer by @EllisCose, Author of Democracy, If We Can Keep It. https://t.co/KM3IET0BZE https://t.co/IF3KQUgtdx
美国公民自由联盟是如何将《权利法案》扩展到各州的？回答者：@EllisCose，《民主，如果我们能保持它》的作者。https://t.co/KM3IET0BZE https://t.co/IF3KQUgtdx
美國公民自由聯盟是如何將《權利法案》擴展到各州的？回答者：@EllisCose，《民主，如果我們能保持它》的作者。https://t.co/KM3IET0BZE https://t.co/IF3KQUgtdx

next.title: How can speech recognition be used productively in the classroom? Answer by @ScanlonPatricia, Founder/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/xFtN2nxPnG https://t.co/L4msPxGgg8

localize.full_text: 音声認識を教室でどのように活用すればよいのでしょうか。Answer by @ScanlonPatricia, Founder/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/xFtN2nxPnG https://t.co/L4msPxGgg8
语音识别如何在课堂上卓有成效地使用？回答者：@ScanlonPatricia, 创始人/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/xFtN2nxPnG https://t.co/L4msPxGgg8
語音識別如何在課堂上卓有成效地使用？回答者：@ScanlonPatricia, 創始人/CEO @soapboxlabs. https://t.co/xFtN2nxPnG https://t.co/L4msPxGgg8
